t:
you kept it beating.
When my brain wanted to end it all,
                                     you gave me hope.
When the pain was too much,
                                    you gave me a hug.

You have given so much and I can never give enough back.

So thank you for being my everything
when no one else was.
c:
Romantic enough? I've no idea. Cause this is #humanAIcollaboration: This poem was written by a computer.



#hope #hug #love #pain

Time to collab and complete this #lovepoem. #heartwantedto #YourQuoteAndMine
